biotools.summary:
Predicting protein inter-residue contacts using composite likelihood maximization and deep learning. Improving residue-residue contacts prediction.
Welcome to use clmDCA for protein contact prediction.
COLORS is more effcient than PSICOV, mfDCA and plmDCA.
